title: Refresh header/hero design and update hero copy for course modes across Chhattisgarh

requirements.summary: Update home hero messaging to clearly state Open/Distance and Online course modes are available across Chhattisgarh with correct English.
acceptanceCriteria: Home hero section includes the information that courses are available in Open/Distance and Online modes.
Home hero section includes the information that services/courses are available across Chhattisgarh.
All new/updated user-facing text is in clear English with correct spelling (e.g., “Open/Distance”, “Online”, “Chhattisgarh”).

file_operations.description: Rewrite the hero headline and supporting paragraph to explicitly mention courses available in Open/Distance mode and Online mode across Chhattisgarh, ensuring correct spelling/grammar and preserving existing CTA buttons and scroll behavior.

requirements.summary: Redesign the upper section (fixed header + home hero) with a more polished, responsive layout while keeping navigation targets and smooth scroll behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Header remains fixed and functional on desktop and mobile, including the mobile menu toggle and smooth scrolling to sections.
The hero section layout/styling is visibly updated (typography, spacing, and/or composition) without removing the existing CTAs.
The updated upper design remains consistent with the site’s existing design system (colors, typography, components) and does not introduce blue/purple as the primary palette.
No changes are made to immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (hooks and ui components remain unedited).

file_operations.description: Refresh header visuals (spacing, typography, container layout, and scrolled-state styling) while preserving fixed positioning, existing navigation labels/targets (Home/Services/Streams/About/Contact), mobile menu toggle behavior, and smooth scrolling.

Update hero composition (layout, spacing, and typographic hierarchy) to a more polished design while keeping the existing CTAs and the background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/vidhyapith-education-hero.dim_1600x900.png in use.

Adjust global styling tokens/utilities as needed to support the refreshed upper-section look (e.g., consistent shadows, subtle borders, and readable hero overlay), keeping the existing teal/emerald + warm accent palette and avoiding blue/purple as primary.
